text: Kudos to the nine UAMS physicians recognized as Healthcare Research All-Stars! Their dedication to innovative research and excellent patient care is truly inspiring. It's no surprise that the UAMS Hip and Knee surgery team ranked among the top 1%, and the orthopaedic surgery team, gastrointestinal, and general surgery teams were all ranked inside the top 5% nationwide. Their tireless efforts are a testament to the power of collaboration in advancing healthcare.
